text.content:
Eat Dirt

You fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone] and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] until the end of your next turn.

Melee

Overcompensate

Cover provides a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.Effect: +4 circumstance bonus to AC against your ranged attacks]{+4 circumstance bonus to AC against your ranged attacks} against your ranged attacks for 1 minute.

Ranged

That tastes Awful!

If this was a jaws attack (or similar), you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 3}.

Unarmed

Strange Transference

Lose one prepared spell or spell slot, determined randomly by the GM. Your target can Cast this Spell on its next turn even if they can't cast spells, using your level, spell attack modifier, and spell DC.

Spell
